name: Rules of Dead Walking Island
description:
Are you ready to survive? A Lot of people were infected with viruses and became living dead. You are one of the survivors. You are involved in the war against the dead zombies.

Time to attack and enter the apocalypse world of Last Hope. Zombies, raiders and vicious deadly enemies roam the lost island throughout the world. Rescue survivors and kill to stay alive, only you can save the world in this story.

Main Features:

Halloween theme
Easy and smooth controls
Survival mode and story mode
Protect your partner and yourself from zombies
Variety of weapons and rifles to combat against zombies!
High-quality 3d graphics & best sound effects!
